title: Polki & Pearl Jadau Choker - Ratnagarbhika "Pearl Treasure"
materials: Uncut Polki Diamonds (నాచురల్ పోల్కీ వజ్రాలు). Gold with Hyderabadi Polish.
features: Elaborate floral Jadau design, meticulously hand-set with uncut polki diamonds. The choker features multiple strands of lustrous freshwater pearls creating a regal, layered effect. Square central polki arrangement for a striking geometric contrast.
description: Exquisite craftsmanship showcasing traditional Jadau setting techniques. High-quality, natural freshwater pearls offer timeless elegance. Polki diamonds provide a unique, rustic charm and unmatched brilliance. A statement piece that combines cultural heritage with modern sophistication. Handcrafted in Hyderabad by skilled artisans.
